prompt: 소중한 사람에게 전하는 가장 아름다운 고백. 오늘, 예쁜 꽃 한 송이로 일상에 향기를 더해보세요.
svg:
<svg width="1920" height="1080" viewBox="0 0 1920 1080" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <defs>
    <linearGradient id="background_gradient" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="100%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:#FFDDC1;stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:#FFE4E1;stop-opacity:1" />
    </linearGradient>
    <radialGradient id="flower_gradient_petal" cx="50%" cy="50%" r="50%" fx="50%" fy="50%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:#FFB6C1;stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:#FF69B4;stop-opacity:1" />
    </radialGradient>
    <linearGradient id="flower_gradient_stem" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="100%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:#90EE90;stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:#6B8E23;stop-opacity:1" />
    </linearGradient>
  </defs>

  <!-- Background -->
  <rect id="background_rect" x="0" y="0" width="1920" height="1080" fill="url(#background_gradient)" />

  <!-- Flower - A stylized blossom -->
  <path id="flower_petal_1" d="M0 -100 C 50 -150, 100 -50, 50 0 C 0 50, -50 0, 0 -100 Z" transform="translate(1000 500) scale(1.5)" fill="url(#flower_gradient_petal)" stroke="#FF69B4" stroke-width="2" />
  <path id="flower_petal_2" d="M-86.6 -50 C -136.6 -100, -86.6 0, -36.6 50 C 13.4 100, 63.4 50, -86.6 -50 Z" transform="translate(1000 500) scale(1.5) rotate(72)" fill="url(#flower_gradient_petal)" stroke="#FF69B4" stroke-width="2" />
  <path id="flower_petal_3" d="M-86.6 -50 C -136.6 -100, -86.6 0, -36.6 50 C 13.4 100, 63.4 50, -86.6 -50 Z" transform="translate(1000 500) scale(1.5) rotate(144)" fill="url(#flower_gradient_petal)" stroke="#FF69B4" stroke-width="2" />
  <path id="flower_petal_4" d="M-86.6 -50 C -136.6 -100, -86.6 0, -36.6 50 C 13.4 100, 63.4 50, -86.6 -50 Z" transform="translate(1000 500) scale(1.5) rotate(216)" fill="url(#flower_gradient_petal)" stroke="#FF69B4" stroke-width="2" />
  <path id="flower_petal_5" d="M-86.6 -50 C -136.6 -100, -86.6 0, -36.6 50 C 13.4 100, 63.4 50, -86.6 -50 Z" transform="translate(1000 500) scale(1.5) rotate(288)" fill="url(#flower_gradient_petal)" stroke="#FF69B4" stroke-width="2" />
  <circle id="flower_center" cx="1000" cy="500" r="30" fill="#FFC0CB" stroke="#FF69B4" stroke-width="2"/>
  
  <path id="flower_stem" d="M990 600 L950 1000 L970 1000 L1010 600 Z" fill="url(#flower_gradient_stem)" />
  <path id="flower_leaf_1" d="M970 850 C950 800, 900 800, 880 850 C900 900, 950 900, 970 850 Z" fill="url(#flower_gradient_stem)" stroke="#6B8E23" stroke-width="2" />

  <!-- Text elements -->
  <text id="text_confession_1" x="300" y="300" font-family="Noto Sans KR, sans-serif" font-size="60" fill="#4B0082" text-anchor="start" font-weight="bold">사랑하는 이에게</text>
  <text id="text_confession_2" x="300" y="380" font-family="Noto Sans KR, sans-serif" font-size="60" fill="#4B0082" text-anchor="start" font-weight="bold">가장 아름다운</text>
  <text id="text_confession_3" x="300" y="460" font-family="Noto Sans KR, sans-serif" font-size="80" fill="#4B0082" text-anchor="start" font-weight="bold">고백</text>
  <text id="text_confession_4" x="300" y="600" font-family="Noto Sans KR, sans-serif" font-size="50" fill="#8A2BE2" text-anchor="start">오늘, 이 꽃으로</text>
  <text id="text_confession_5" x="300" y="670" font-family="Noto Sans KR, sans-serif" font-size="50" fill="#8A2BE2" text-anchor="start">향기를 선물해요</text>

</svg>
